joelib2.gui.render3D.math.geometry
Class Point3D

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.gui.render3D.math.geometry.Point3D

public class Point3D
extends Object

A class that provides mathematical definition of and utility for 3D geometric points

Author:
  • Zhidong Xie (zxie@tripos.com)
  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.
